DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety, tolerability, and efficacy of NGM282 in patients with nonalcoholic steatohepatitis.
DOC.brief_title: Study of NGM282 in Patients With Nonalcoholic Steatohepatitis (NASH)
DOC.criteria: Males or females, between 18 and 75 years of age, inclusive Histologically confirmed NASH diagnosis Clinically significant acute or chronic liver disease Prior liver transplantation
